org.mmbase.security.implementation.cloudcontext.workflow

Class WorkFlowContextProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.security.implementation.cloudcontext.BasicContextProvider
      • org.mmbase.security.implementation.cloudcontext.workflow.WorkFlowContextProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextProvider

    public class WorkFlowContextProvider
extends BasicContextProvider
    For the moment only supports contextes prefixed with deleted:. But when necesary we'll also add e.g. 'unchecked:' or so. In other words we are using security to make nodes invisible.
    Since:
    MMBase-1.9.6
    Version:
    $Id: BasicContextProvider.java 37281 2009-07-27 12:28:24Z michiel $
    Author:
    Michiel Meeuwissen
